zh: 战略配备英雄: 效果

en: Edit the list of stratagems able to appear.
zh: 编辑可出现的战备的列表

en: Arrows won't be shown, used to practicing your memory.
zh: 不会显示箭头，用于练习记忆和盲打

en: Continuous, irregular sequence, used to practicing your real-time react ability.
zh: 连续的、无规律的无尽箭头序列，用于练习即时反应能力

en: Complete all stratagems on screen to beat a round, used to practicing your overall proficiency.
zh: 完成屏幕上的所有战备以通关一回合，用于练习综合熟练度

en: Game over when just wrong once.
zh: 只要按错一次就游戏结束

en: Adjust which stratagems are able to appear in game.
zh: 设置游戏中能够出现哪些战备
轨道凝固汽油弹火力网
超级地球武装部队大炮
